snippet: The Giants, the unassuming N.F.L. champions, will face the Jets, their headline-generating cotenants, in their annual preseason game on Saturday.
abstract: New York Giants, who have kept a low profile so far this year, prepare to face the New York Jets, who have already had a series of headline-generating incidents, in the second preseason game for both teams.
lead_paragraph: The Giants, the unassuming N.F.L. champions, will face the Jets, their headline-generating cotenants, in their annual preseason game on Saturday.

headline.seo: As Jets Grab Spotlight, Giants Gladly Step Aside
headline.main: As Jets Grab Spotlight, Giants Are Happy to Step Aside
headline.print_headline: As Jets Grab Spotlight, Giants Are Happy to Step Aside
